name: The Pecking Order
description:
This is a totally normal office with totally normal people working totally normal jobs. Nothing to see here, and if you do see anything, just forget it and report it to HR!

Headphones recommended

Warning: Flashing lights

Mac build is untested

Credits:

LAN Laboratories

Luis (https://whatifzeldawasagirl.itch.io/) - Audio

Avery (https://aveaf.itch.io/) - Art

Nathan (https://countthrepe.itch.io/) - Code

All code, art, and music was created during the week long window, no premade assets were used.
